item.title: Patching worn through again with multiple potholes, 22nd October
item.description:
This is a high volume crossing point in the lanes and always gets patched only to be destroyed again within 6 months. Please fix properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Telstar Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowth covering jerb reducng road width, 22nd October
item.description:
Kerb on fencing side
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranham Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes outside the wagon and horses car park entrance, 22nd October
item.description:
Where the surface outside the wagon and horses pub car park is badly deteriorated, there is a significant pothole on the RH side of the road, facing hucclecote road and a similar sized one on the LH side in the middle of the carriageway. They have been there for over 6 months and are getting worse. I have already damaged my car on one of them as they are hard to avoid due to the bad parking there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Notley Place, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
